content.html: Intentionality is so important when building team culture. "[Being intentionally positive is] about being respectful to coworkers, empathetic and thoughtful in communication, quick to correct and apologize when you make a mistake, and quick to forgive when others do."
content.text:
Intentionality is so important when building team culture.

"[Being intentionally positive is] about being respectful to coworkers, empathetic and thoughtful in communication, quick to correct and apologize when you make a mistake, and quick to forgive when others do."
